name: ALASKA
description: 'Alaska' gives players a week in the life of an Alaskan man living a simple life in a small community, but when a body is found, murdered, on the towns airstrip, everything changes for Blake. Go fishing, ice skating and hunting with your neighbors as you live your days in the Final Frontier.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
